problem_statement: Build a fullstack web application that simulates exactly-once processing of tasks. Users can submit tasks with optional IDs, and the system ensures each task is processed only once, even with retries, duplicates, or simultaneous submissions. The app should include a dashboard to view task status, results, and history, and handle edge cases like failures or partial processing
FAIL_TO_PASS: tests/frontend/TaskDashboard.test.tsx::TaskDashboard::renders the dashboard title
tests/frontend/TaskDashboard.test.tsx::TaskDashboard::fetches and displays tasks
tests/frontend/TaskDashboard.test.tsx::TaskDashboard::handles fetch error gracefully
tests/frontend/TaskDashboard.test.tsx::TaskDashboard::submits a new task successfully
tests/frontend/TaskDashboard.test.tsx::TaskDashboard::handles duplicate/idempotent submission
tests/frontend/TaskDashboard.test.tsx::TaskDashboard::handles invalid JSON payload
tests/frontend/TaskDashboard.test.tsx::TaskDashboard::handles submission error with error message
tests/frontend/TaskDashboard.test.tsx::TaskDashboard::handles submission error without response data
tests/unit/processing.test.ts::processTask::should process a pending task successfully
tests/unit/processing.test.ts::processTask::should handle processing failure
tests/unit/processing.test.ts::processTask::should not process if task not found
tests/unit/processing.test.ts::processTask::should not process if already processing or completed
tests/unit/processing.test.ts::processTask::should not process if failed and max retries reached
tests/unit/processing.test.ts::processTask::should process if failed and retries < max
tests/unit/processing.test.ts::processTask::should handle locking failure (race condition)
tests/unit/processing.test.ts::processTask::should handle unexpected errors during processing logic
tests/integration.test.ts::Exactly-Once Processing Simulator Integration Tests::should return health status
tests/integration.test.ts::Exactly-Once Processing Simulator Integration Tests::should submit a task successfully and return a task ID
tests/integration.test.ts::Exactly-Once Processing Simulator Integration Tests::should list tasks
tests/integration.test.ts::Exactly-Once Processing Simulator Integration Tests::should handle duplicate task submissions with same taskId (Idempotency)
tests/integration.test.ts::Exactly-Once Processing Simulator Integration Tests::should process a task exactly once
tests/integration.test.ts::Exactly-Once Processing Simulator Integration Tests::should handle concurrent submissions of the same task
